result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Matthew L Deridder

defendant.name: Deridder, Matthew L
defendant.address: 113 Worden Ave. E., Apt. 1, Ladysmith, WI 54848

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Matthew L Deridder in court with attorney Kari Suzanne Hoel.  Defendant Matthew L Deridder in custody.  James Jay Rennicke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Heard along with 15CM107, 15CM117, 15CM125, 15CM143.   Init app in 15CM125-waive reading of the CC, enter plea of NG to all charges.  Court will modify cash bond to $1000.00. DE may not be present anywhere alcohol is available.  Do not operate a MV w/o a valid operating privilege, all other conditions will remian.  


Court recites case settlement into the court record.  Court instructs on plea questionnaire/waiver of rights.  Court will accept waiver.

15CM106
  CT1-GNC-COURT ACCEPTS AND FINDS DE GUILTY, DISMISS REPEATER
  CT 2-GNC-COURT ACCEPTS AND FINDS DE GUILTY, DISMISS REPEATER

15CM107-DRI

15CM117
   CT 1-GNC, COURT ACCEPTS, FINDS DE GUILTY, DISMISS REPEATER.
   CT 2-DRI

15CM125-DRI

COURT WILL ORDER SENTENCE WITHHELD, 2 YEARS PROBATION, CONCURRENT.  DE WILL ABIDE BY ALL AODA PROVISIONS, WILL MAINTAIN ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY, DE will not possess or use any illicit or illegal substances.  Restitution will be paid from bond posted.  The remainder will be forfeited to the county.   DE will pay resitution of $151.00 to victim.  DE will pay CC.  Set 15CM143 for RH 9-22-15 @ 1:00PM.

Defendant Matthew L Deridder in court with Attorney Karie Hoel.  James Jay Rennicke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Heard along with 15CM107, 15CM117, 15CM125.  Court in Session 1:10 p.m.  Attorney Rennicke states cases and appearances.  15CM117 - Court reads complaint.  15CM125 - Atorney reads complaint to Defendant.  Attorney Hoel states client will plead NG to both cases.  Previous bond to continue and will be concurrent on all cases.  Court addresses defendant.  Defendant makes statement to the Court.  Court instructs Mr. DeRidder to set up appointment with Jeremy Jacobs today.  Nothing to review on 15CM106 and 15CM107 - Court schedules all cases to 9/14/15 at 2:30 p.m. (Review Hearing).  Court adjourned 1:23 p.m.
